resources.string: Civilization IV: A New Dawn - Mega Civ Pack

Revision: ${REVISION}

 This setup wizard will guide you through the installation of more than 100 new civilizations for Civilization IV: A New Dawn.

 The mod will be extracted into your Civilization IV: A New Dawn current installation.

 Note: The installation can take some minutes, please be patient.
Setup will install the expansion pack where Civilization IV: A New Dawn is installed.$\nIf the original mod is installed in another folder, please select it before to continue.
The new civilizations are now installed. Enjoy.
